DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Edwards Aortic Bioprosthesis , Model 11000
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-randomized , non-controlled observational clinical trial . Up 200 subject enrol 6 participate clinical site . The trial include male female patient , 18 year old , require replacement diseased , damage , malfunction native prosthetic valve . Patients follow assessed implant 5 year .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Require replacement aortic valve Signed informed consent Willing return study site followup visit Active endocarditis/myocarditis ( < 3 month ) Myocardial infarction ( < 30 day ) Renal insufficiency/ Endstage renal disease Life expectancy ( < 1 year ) Requires multiple valve replacement/repair Requiring emergent aortic valve surgery Pregnant lactating
